synopsis:
An otaku high school student, Tomoya Aki, designs his very own dating-simulation game. In order to make his desire a reality, Tomoya must persuade a few eccentric "creators" from his school.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.en: Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend Prologue
title.jp: Saenai Heroine no Sodatekata: Ai to Seishun no Service-kai
